document.full_text: the son of libyan leader muammar gaddafi said the government would prevail over rebels trying to oust his father and a new constitution was ready for when the insurgency was defeated, al arabiya tv reported on wednesday.
document.title: new libya constitution ready, gaddafi son says
lines_and_colors: the son of libyan leader muammar gaddafi said the government would prevail over rebels trying to oust his father and a new constitution was ready for when the insurgency was defeated, al arabiya tv reported on wednesday.
